sources.title: Secret Evidence
sources.description: Title: Secret Evidence Summary: PRC - Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Ward McTaggart, Kenneth Harlan, Donald Curtis. When Reynolds becomes engaged to the local DA, played by Quigley, her former boyfriend gangster ... Directed by: William Nigh Actors: Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Malcolm Production Company: Producers Releasing Corporation (PRC) Release Date: 31 January 1941 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 PRC - Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Ward McTaggart, Kenneth Harlan, Donald Curtis. When Reynolds becomes engaged to the local DA, played by Quigley, her former boyfriend gangster shows up. The gangster later ends up shot! However, whos to blame? The finger would seem to point at Marjorie. Nifty PRC crime. 16mm

sources.title: Secret Evidence (1941) CRIME-DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Malcolm McTaggart
 Director: William Nigh

 A naive young woman receives an unpleasant wake-up call when she learns that her seemingly wonderful beau is a notorious gangster. After he is sent to prison, she marries a charming assistant district attorney. Trouble comes when her old flame is paroled and comes looking for a reconciliation!

metadata.Plot: PRC - Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Ward McTaggart, Kenneth Harlan, Donald Curtis. When Reynolds becomes engaged to the local DA, played by Quigley, her former boyfriend gangster shows up. The gangster later ends up shot! However, whos to blame? The finger would seem to point at Marjorie. Nifty PRC crime. 16mm
metadata.Actors: Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Malcolm 'Bud' McTaggart
